title: France panorama. [No. 70/33]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Fashions - Ted Lapidus’ new “long line”. 2. Europe and space - after the conferences in Bonn and NASA and that of Brussels, Europe reorganises ELDO and ESRO. 3. The arts - the “floor and wall” exhibition at the Decorative Arts; Canvases by Empress Farah and her children in a provincial exhibition. 4. In the bowels of the earth - tourism in the french grottoes: Padirac, the Aven Armand and Rouffignac with its prehistoric paintings.
